label: A3B2_hR5_155_e_c-001
title: Hazelwoodite (Ni$_{3}$S$_{2}$, $D5_{e}$) Structure
comments:
This can be considered as a prototype for a high concentration of ordered vacancies in \href{current_web_home_dir/A_hP2_194_c-001}{the hcp structure}. We get the ideal hcp atomic positions when z$_{1}$=1/3 and y$_{2}$=1/6, leaving a vacancy at the origin. 
 Hexagonal settings of this structure can be obtained with the option {\tt --hex}.
